<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=6279) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 190 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Blessed One](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=242)

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Prerequisites**
[Blessed One Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6277); [Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5897); ability to cast spells from spell slots

</column>

---

When you focus your magic on an ally, you can remove harmful conditions. If your next action is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) from a spell slot, and that spell targets only a single ally, you can also attempt to remove a harmful condition from that ally. The condition must be one that could be removed by your [Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5897) feat, including those granted by later feats such as [Greater Mercy](/Feats.aspx?ID=5904). Attempt a counteract check based on the spell’s DC and rank. This effect is in addition to the normal effects of your spell.
name: Blessed Spell
prerequisite: Blessed One Dedication; Mercy; ability to cast spells from spell slots
